plot outline: Yuvraj Kadu Patil, is the only son of a well known tycoon. Yuvraj is a simple guy is surprised when suddenly, Chiku, a six year old boy shows up claiming to be his son. Yuvraj's parents are alarmed and his girlfriend, Angelina deserts him. But, Chiku is not ready to give up. To top it all, Constable Nimbalkar, who's always on the scene, hands over Chiku to Yuvraj repeatedly & asks Yuvraj to accept his responsibility. The Constable has his own set of problems, dealing with an ever-suspicious wife, who checks on him every half an hour. To his bad luck, whenever she calls Nimbalkar, Chiku is always with him strengthening her qualm. In this manner, there is utter chaos in two households thanks to Chiku, resulting in the funniest comedy of the season.
title: Baap Re Baap Dokyala Taap
plot: Yuvraj leads a happy life with his girlfriend Angela. All seems well in his life when suddenly a little kid named Chiku comes into his life and creates a lot of chaos.

Yuvraj Kadu Patil, is the only son of a well known tycoon. Yuvraj is a simple guy is surprised when suddenly, Chiku, a six year old boy shows up claiming to be his son. Yuvraj's parents are alarmed and his girlfriend, Angelina deserts him. But, Chiku is not ready to give up. The Constable has his own set of problems, dealing with an ever-suspicious wife, who checks on him every half an hour. To his bad luck, whenever she calls Nimbalkar, Chiku is always with him strengthening her qualm. In this manner, there is utter chaos in two households thanks to Chiku, resulting in the funniest comedy of the season.::Everest Entertainment

Yuvraj Kadu Patil is the son of a businessmen. A six year old Chiku enters his life claiming to be his son following which his parents get a shock and his girlfriend Angelina deserts him.A police constable Nimbalkar always hands Chiku to Yuvraj whenever he tries to get rid of him,Nimbalkar's wife is suspicious about him and calls every half and hour to check about his whereabouts to make matters worse Nimbalkar is always with Chiku whenever his wife calls.But is Chiku really Yuvraj's son if not why he is calling him a father.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
